title: computation
description: The structure information derived from computation for a molecule entry in database

_id.description: A unique identifier for the molecule

hash_id.description: A unique identifier for the molecule hashed from identifying properties

submission_info.description: A unique identifier for the molecule

calculation_type.description: Type of calculation file (opt-freq, energy, or tddft).

is_groundState.description: Whether this charge is the ground state charge

number_of_electrons.description: number of electrons in the molecule

scf_dipole_moment.description: The X, Y, and Z dipole components of electric dipole moment. Units: Debye

scf_total_energy.description: Highest occupied molecular orbital. Units: eV

homo.description: Highest occupied molecular orbital. Units: eV

lumo.description: Lowest unoccupied molecular orbital. Units: eV

frequency_dict.description: A list for each freq calculation and for each mode of a dict with {“frequency”: freq in cm-1, “symmetry”: symmetry tag “r_mass”: Reduce mass, “f_constant”: force constant, “IR_intensity”: IR Intensity, “mode”: normal mode}. The normal mode is a 1D vector of dx, dy dz of each atom.

excitation_energies.description: TD-DFT excited states such as single, triplet, adiabatic, etc. Returns a list of tuple for each transition such as [(energy (eV), lambda (nm), oscillatory strength), … ]
